api_research_output_schema_v2.description: Enhanced schema version 2 with detailed endpoint documentation

technical_info.data_formats: array - supported formats (JSON, XML, CSV, etc.)

structure.path: string - endpoint path relative to base URL
structure.documentation_link: string - direct link to this endpoint's documentation

documentation_sections.getting_started: string - URL to getting started guide
documentation_sections.endpoints_reference: string - URL to complete endpoints reference
documentation_sections.sdks_libraries: string - URL to SDKs and client libraries

example_endpoint_object.description: Search and retrieve academic publication metadata
example_endpoint_object.response_format: JSON with results array and metadata
